sourcesContent:
import { Component , OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-banner-section', templateUrl: './banner-section.component.html', styleUrls: ['./banner-section.component.css'] }) export class BannerSectionComponent { slides: any[] = [ { image: 'path_to_image1', content: 'Slide 1 Content' }, { image: 'path_to_image2', content: 'Slide 2 Content' }, { image: 'path_to_image3', content: 'Slide 3 Content' } // Add more slides as needed ]; currentIndex: number = 0; ngOnInit() { setInterval(() => { this.currentIndex = (this.currentIndex + 1) % this.slides.length; }, 7000); } getCurrentSlide() { return this.slides[this.currentIndex]; } }
{{ getCurrentSlide().content }}
